channel.title: Removing Old Mail from the Inbox in GMail
channel.description: I recently moved my domain email over to Google Apps for Domains. So far I have been very happy with it and all my family have been set up with accounts, and all is working well for them to. I...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Alan James+00:00
item.description:
Thanks for this excellent work around. A pity you can't find such a solution on the Google site. I searched for ages after dropping my Gmail account since I didn't want copies of old emails out there. Your solution works perfectly.
Alan
item.dc:creator: Alan James
